issue.title: conta.olx.com.br
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://conta.olx.com.br/anuncios/publicados](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fconta.olx.com.br%2Fanuncios%2Fpublicados) ### Comment > The site https://www.olx.com.br/ "account" modal is not displayed when AdGuard/uBO – Cookie Notices is enabled. In the screenshots you can see that clicking on your profile should bring the "account" modal, but the modal doesn't appear if click there with the list enabled, only if the list is disabled. > > This panel is very important because it's the only way of accessing your published ads, purchases, account settings, etc in the OLX website. > > I use the latest uBlock and Firefox. Username: `@SecretX33` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ppsgh33glxwscoogsw0wokkw4okkkockda41vgzltc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ckb4jnwqr6ogsso0co880k84o8w80s8q6fq1dgpj2o.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin (using AdGuard/uBO – Cookie Notices) v0.0.0 System version: | Windows 11 version 24H2 Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices Other extensions used: | uBlock Origin
